properties.entry: SELECT CHATTING_NO , CHATTING_MEMBER_NO , CHATTING_CITY , CHATTING_DATE , CHATTING_CHECK FROM CHATTING JOIN MEMBER ON(MEMBER_NO = CHATTING_MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY CHATTING_NO DESC
SELECT CHATTING_NO , MEMBER_ID , CHATTING_CITY , CHATTING_DATE , CHATTING_CHECK FROM CHATTING JOIN MEMBER ON(MEMBER_NO = CHATTING_MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
